verses.verse: Let <S%G5293><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> be in subjection <S%G5293>to<s%> the <S%G5242>higher<s%> <S%G1849>powers<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> power1849, 1487 <S%G3361>but<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; and the <S%G1849>powers<s%> that <S%G5607>be<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5021>ordained<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> he that <S%G498>resisteth<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%>, <S%G436>withstandeth<s%> the <S%G1296>ordinance<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> they that <S%G436>withstand<s%> shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G5401>terror<s%> <S%G2041>to<s%> the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2041>to<s%> the <S%G2556>evil<s%>. And wouldest <S%G2309>thou<s%> have <S%G3361>no<s%> fear <S%G5399>of<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%>? <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G2556>evil<s%>, be <S%G5399>afraid<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G5409>beareth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%> in <S%G1500>vain<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, an <S%G1558>avenger<s%> for <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> him that <S%G4238>doeth<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> ye must <S%G318>needs<s%> be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3709>wrath<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>' sake.

<S%G1063><s%> <S%G1223>For<s%> this <S%G5124>cause<s%> <S%G5055>ye<s%> pay <S%G5411>tribute<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3011>ministers<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4342>service<s%>, attending continually <S%G1519>upon<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> very <S%G846>thing<s%>.

Render591, 3767 to <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G3782>dues<s%>: <S%G5411>tribute<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5411>tribute<s%> is <S%G5056>due<s%>; custom to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5056>custom<s%>; <S%G5401>fear<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>; <S%G5092>honor<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%>.

Owe <S%G3784><s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G1487>anything<s%>, <S%G3361>save<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he that <S%G25>loveth<s%> his <S%G2087>neighbor<s%> hath <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>this<s%>, Thou <S%G3431>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, Thou <S%G5407>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5407>kill<s%>, Thou <S%G2813>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%>, Thou <S%G5576>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1937>covet<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%>, it is <S%G346>summed<s%> up <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G1722>namely<s%>, Thou shalt <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1438>thyself<s%>.
Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G2038>worketh<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2556>ill<s%> to his <S%G4139>neighbor<s%>: <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> is the <S%G4138>fulfilment<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the <S%G5610>season<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> it is <S%G2540>time<s%> for <S%G2248>you<s%> to <S%G1453>awake<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5258>sleep<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2257>is<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1452>nearer<s%> to us <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we first <S%G4100>believed<s%>.

The <S%G3571>night<s%> is far <S%G1161>spent<s%>, and the <S%G2250>day<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand<s%>: let <S%G659>us<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> cast <S%G659>off<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> let us put <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G3696>armor<s%> of <S%G5457>light<s%>.

Let us <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2156>becomingly<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%>; <S%G3361>not<s%> in <S%G2970>revelling<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3178>drunkenness<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> in <S%G2845>chambering<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G766>wantonness<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> in <S%G2054>strife<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2205>jealousy<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> put ye <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4307>provision<s%> for the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> fulfil the lusts <S%G1939>thereof<s%>.
